## ContentDivinator.factory() method

Create a preconfigured ContentDivinator based on statically stored files.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static factory(predefined: AvailableStopWordResources, locales?: string[]): ContentDivinator;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                                    | Description                                                                                                                          |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| predefined | <code>AvailableStopWordResources</code> | Load a locally available stop-word library, refer to [AvailableStopWordResources](./content-divinator.availablestopwordresources.md) |
| locales    | <code>string[]</code>                   | Add more locale tags, if needed                                                                                                      |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ContentDivinator`
